mapper.select:
SELECT company, pro_type, staff, zg_level, zpno, id, `name`, place_name, pnum, sex, tel, DATE_FORMAT(birth_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as birth_date, work_name, DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(graduation_time,""),'%Y-%m')as graduation_time, school, major, degree, remark, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') - SUBSTRING( pnum,7,4) AS age, selected, effected FROM user_expert_info_pickup
WHERE del_date is null
and name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and pnum like CONCAT('%',#{pnum},'%')
and company like CONCAT('%',#{company},'%')
and tel like CONCAT('%',#{tel},'%')
and name = #{name2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and b.pnum=#{pnum2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and pro_type = #{pro_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and id in
#{item}
order by effected desc

SELECT company, pro_type, staff, zg_level, zpno, id, `name`, place_name, pnum, sex, tel, DATE_FORMAT(birth_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as birth_date, work_name, DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(graduation_time,""),'%Y-%m-%d')as graduation_time, school, major, degree, remark, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') - SUBSTRING( pnum,7,4) as age, selected, effected FROM user_expert_info_pickup
WHERE 60 >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') - SUBSTRING( pnum,7,4) and del_date is null and pro_type=#{_parameter}
SELECT DISTINCT pro_type from user_expert_info_pickup where del_date is null
SELECT DISTINCT company from user_expert_info_pickup where pro_type=#{_parameter}
mapper.update: update user_expert_info_pickup set selected ="是" where id=#{0}
update user_expert_info_pickup set effected ="否" where pro_type=#{_parameter}
